author: thiago_crowdtainer
content: Hi all. Just wanted to throw an idea here, as food for thought: https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=27016630 .. I think with a similar approach it might be possible to serve eth state for light-clients that function directly in the browser, if the right file format and data structures are used such that the number of queries are reduced enough to overcome network latencies. I think the work done by beam sync effort/team is already kind of in this direction anyways thanks to <@!364458974906548225>  and others
